articles.author: Jabari Young
articles.title: MLB's latest tactic to start its season comes courtesy of Dr. Anthony Fauci - CNBC
articles.description: Major League Baseball commissioner Rob Manfred rejected the players union proposal of a 70-game season as both sides continue to its battle to start the 2020 season suspended by Covid-19.
articles.content:
Hoping to get Major League Baseball on track to start its season paused due to Covid-19, league commissioner Rob Manfred wasted no time using the nation's top disease expert, Dr. Anthony Fauci.
